subject: Data
title: Privacy-Preserving Technologies
description: A quick win: understand Privacy-Preserving Technologies.

hook.text: What if companies could analyze your data without ever seeing it? That technology already exists.

buildup.text: Differential privacy adds mathematical noise to data so patterns emerge without exposing individual records.

discovery.text: Federated learning trains AI on your device and shares only the model â€” never your raw data.

twist.text: Apple uses differential privacy for keyboard suggestions. Google uses federated learning for Gboard.

climax.text: Privacy-preserving tech offers a middle path: useful data insights without surveillance.

punchline.text: The future may let us have data value without data exposure.

quiz.question: What does federated learning share instead of raw data?
options: Only the trained model, not the underlying data
